events.message: Customer reported a car collision that occurred at the intersection causing front-end damage to the vehicle.
The claim was categorized under Auto Accident following a detailed review of the initial report and damage photos.
An claims agent was assigned to handle the car accident case and will be in contact with the customer soon.
The claim was acknowledged formally, and the customer was informed that their case is now being processed.
Requested the customer submit photos of vehicle damage, police report, and driver's license for claim verification.
Customer submitted all requested documents including detailed pictures of the damaged car and the police report.
Investigation commenced by the claims team to assess liability and confirm the extent of vehicle damage.
Investigation confirmed the accident circumstances matched customerâ€™s report, validating the claim coverage.
A settlement amount was proposed to cover the repair costs for the damaged vehicle after review.
Customer responded positively to the proposed settlement and expressed satisfaction with the process.
Claim officially approved for payment following customer agreement with the settlement proposal.
Payment was issued promptly to cover the vehicle repair expenses as per the claim settlement terms.
The claim was closed successfully after confirming the payment was received and repairs completed.
All relevant case documentation was archived in the system for future reference and auditing purposes.
